oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Citizens for General Improvement newsletter, Series 1, Issue 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Citizens for General Improvement (Chattanooga, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Newsletter and forward from the Chattanooga, Tennessee group Citizens for General Improvement pressing the Chattanooga Board of Education to move forward with integration and address the problems of overcrowding in public schools.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education

Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1953-1961
